plot: Cobra is very known space pirate, but decides to change his face and to clear all his memories. He becomes a common guy, with a common job, and a very boring life, but suddenly he starts remembering his true identity and new adventures begin.
opening_theme: "Cobra the Space Pirate" by Sasja Antheunis
ending_theme: "Kimi no Uta (Your Song)" by Shigeru Matsuzaki
"Kimi no Uta" (君の歌) by Shigeru Matsuzaki
insert_song: "Jingle Bells" (ジングル・ベル) by Sasja Antheunis (ep 1)
"Silent Night" (きよしこの夜) by Sasja Antheunis (ep 1)
